Body:
"""
        Test that the right error is raised when neither derivation data nor
        key material are provided for hash-based key derivation.
        """
engine = crypto.CryptographyEngine()
args = enums.DerivationMethod.HASH, 16
kwargs = {'hash_algorithm': enums.HashingAlgorithm.SHA_256}
self.assertRaisesRegex(exceptions.InvalidField,
    'For hash-based key derivation, derivation data or key material must be specified.'
    , engine.derive_key, *args, **kwargs)
